content: **free video tutorial** https //www youtube com/watch v=hkdz0gctz5e&t=2043s **free chart & pattern you can find here** https //thelagombox com/crochetpatterns/maze-pouch-cosmetic-bag-crochet-pattern the maze pouch is one of those pieces that quickly becomes part of your everyday life crocheted with the simple mosaic technique it has a clean and geometric look but what makes it truly special is its versatility it can be your little project bag for yarn and hooks a cozy pouch for crochet tools a makeup bag a pencil case or even a small companion for walks with just the right size for your phone and keys whatever you choose it adapts with ease with just a few color choices you can make it your own soft and minimal bold and bright or somewhere in between it is practical stylish and timeless the kind of handmade piece you will always find useful **yarn** drops safran 1 175 yards 160 meters 1 8 ounces 50 gr per skein 100% egyptian cotton 1 skein drops muskat 2 109 yards 100 meters 1 8 ounces 50 gr per skein 100% mercerized cotton 1 skein **crochet hook ** 3 0 mm c - or size to meet gauge 3 **supplies** embroidery needles 4 stitch markers 5 scissors 6 canvas pouch 8 3 x 4 7 7 **skill level ** intermediate **abbreviations** written in u s crochet terms **chain** - chain **single_crochet** - single_crochet **double_crochet** - double_crochet **blo** - back loop only **flo** - front loop only **repeat** - repeat **skip** - skip **st s ** - stitch es **special stitches ** **drop-down double_crochet** - drop-down double_crochet - work a double_crochet in the front loop of stitch 2 row below **features ** worked in one continuous piece no sewing required easy to adjust let s be friends on social media website https //thelagombox com instagram https //www instagram com/thelagombox/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/katerinabro/ youtube https //www youtube com/@thelagombox when sharing projects on social media i d love to see them please use #thelagombox it is much appreciated and loved 1 https //amzn to/4odl5pk 2 https //amzn to/435qjx1 3 https //amzn to/3kgtd34 4 https //amzn to/4711zvg 5 https //amzn to/3vxsfyy 6 https //amzn to/46ysymx 7 https //amzn to/47iu1ua
